title: Analytics Dashboard SaaS
pitch: Real-time analytics dashboard for e-commerce stores with Shopify integration
description:
A fully functional SaaS analytics dashboard built with Next.js and PostgreSQL. Includes Shopify OAuth integration, real-time visitor tracking, conversion funnels, and automated email reports. Currently serving 45 paying customers.

## Why I'm selling
Moving on to a new venture and can't give this the attention it deserves.

## What's included
- Full source code (Next.js + PostgreSQL)
- Shopify app listing (approved)
- 45 active paying customers
- All documentation and runbooks
